Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. This product not only serves its intended purpose exceptionally well but also adds a touch of elegance to your lifestyle. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $150, which includes a special discount for early buyers. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that promises durability and style. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
